title: 5 million comments from Beşiktaş fans on Jadon Sancho Instagram post !
body_text:
5 million comments from Beşiktaş fans on Jadon Sancho's Instagram post!
Beşiktaş fans flocked to the Instagram profile of Jadon Sancho, who is on the transfer agenda. The 5 million comments written for the English player surprised even the European press. Here are the details...
Beşiktaş, which aims to become champions in the 2025-26 season, continues its transfer activities at full speed. The Black and Whites are closely monitoring the situation of Jadon Sancho, who was previously linked with Fenerbahçe. Beşiktaş fans want the star player to join the team very much. Black-and-white football fans have started a big campaign on social media for this.
Read More ›
Jadon Sancho statement from Serdal Adalı
Beşiktaş President also answered the question of Jadon Sancho at a press conference yesterday. "I also want Sancho very much, but the player's decision to come to Turkey is very important. We don't have the luxury to buy everything we want for a ridiculous amount of money. For 1.5 months this issue has been on the agenda. We will do our best but it is important that the player wants to come first. We don't plan to force anyone to come to Beşiktaş. We will force every condition. Footballers generally prefer teams that are in the Champions League. It's not right to say today whether it will happen or not. If it is possible, we will buy it," he said.
28 million euros
Read More ›
Jadon Sancho has a one-year contract with English Premier League club Manchester United. The Red Devils have lost the player and decided to sell Sancho. The 25-year-old's current market value is 28 million euros according to Transfermarkt.
50 million comments on his Instagram post!
On the other hand, Besiktas fans launched a huge campaign for Jadon Sancho on social media. The black-and-whites showered the English winger's latest post on Instagram with comments. Jadon Sancho's post received more than 5 million comments. In addition, ESPN reported this event and said, "Jadon Sancho's last Instagram post received more than 5 million comments."
